mapper.sql: a.id, a.area_code AS "areaCode", a.name, a.province, a.city, a.type, a.remarks, a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date, a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date, a.del_flag
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sys_area a
WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY a.area_code
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_area( id, area_code, name, province, city, type, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{areaCode}, #{name}, #{province}, #{city}, #{type}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_area SET province = #{province}, city = #{city}, name = #{name}, type = #{type}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
